channel.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
channel.description: Could someone please help me fix this problem. When I compile everything is fine, but when I try to run my client, it gets close to the end, and in the CMD box it says "Error: loaderror Exion 86" I am using a standard Exion source, and I'm trying to add customs to my client.

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Error 86 is image packing…
Such as new crowns.

Read full topic

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @Purple_Plum Purple Plum
item.description:
@Purple_Plum wrote:

What does this mean:

Exion Client Initialized, revision # 317 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225
When I try to log on it says error connecting to server.
Plus, I couldn’t find the “error 86” I’ve tried multiple keywords in the client.java file.

Read full topic

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @Purple_Plum Purple Plum
item.description:
@Purple_Plum wrote:

I searched for loaderror 86, and nothing, plus what methods do you put?
I’m a noob I know, but tysm for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @Purple_Plum Purple Plum
item.description:
@Purple_Plum wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Oh my bad. I misread the title;

Open your client.java and find loaderror 86.

Post the methods around it.[/quote]
And how could that be done?
Sorry for being such a drag, but I’m relatively new to client-sided work.

Read full topic

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @Purple_Plum Purple Plum
item.description:
@Purple_Plum wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Load error 60 is requesting models. So it obviously has something to do with model loading.

Do you have a model directory? (or a Raw/ directory?)[/quote]
It doesn’t say error 60 anymore, it says error 86, which im pretty sure is loading configurations.
And yes, I’ve set the directories to a folder named “Raw” which was placed in the Client folder, where the classes, etc are. The .dat files are in the “Raw” folder, and the ints are in the itemdef.java folder. I’ve tried increasing the model index, but that isn’t helping :(.

Read full topic

item.title: Error: loaderror Exion 86
item.dc:creator: @Purple_Plum Purple Plum
item.description:
@Purple_Plum wrote:

Could someone please help me fix this problem. When I compile everything is fine, but when I try to run my client, it gets close to the end, and in the CMD box it says “Error: loaderror Exion 86”
I am using a standard Exion source, and I’m trying to add customs to my client.
